languages.text: "Я продолжаю размышлять, как прошла Магнэ Ацессио... вроде бы вполне достойно. Только вот церемониймейстер жаловался, что позабыл конец вечера..."
"My thoughts keep turning to the Magnae Accessio... It was a rather dignified affair, all in all. Except the master of ceremonies complained that he could not remember the end of the night..."
languages.original_text: "Я продолжаю размышлять, как прошла Магнэ Ацессио... вроде бы вполне достойно. Только вот церемониймейстер жаловался, что позабыл конец вечера..."

traits.locale_text: "My thoughts keep turning to the Magnae Accessio... It was a rather dignified affair, all in all. Except the master of ceremonies complained that he could not remember the end of the night..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “我一直在想着继任颂典的事……总体而言，那是场相当隆重的盛典。只是祭仪大师抱怨说，他已经不记得那天晚上是怎么结束的了……”
languages.original_text: "My thoughts keep turning to the Magnae Accessio... It was a rather dignified affair, all in all. Except the master of ceremonies complained that he could not remember the end of the night..."

traits.locale_text: “我一直在想着继任颂典的事……总体而言，那是场相当隆重的盛典。只是祭仪大师抱怨说，他已经不记得那天晚上是怎么结束的了……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'arrête pas de repenser à la Magnae Accessio. Tout s'est déroulé avec une certaine dignité, je trouve. Si on exclut le maître des cérémonies, qui s'est plaint de ne pas se souvenir de la fin de la soirée... »
languages.original_text: "My thoughts keep turning to the Magnae Accessio... It was a rather dignified affair, all in all. Except the master of ceremonies complained that he could not remember the end of the night..."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'arrête pas de repenser à la Magnae Accessio. Tout s'est déroulé avec une certaine dignité, je trouve. Si on exclut le maître des cérémonies, qui s'est plaint de ne pas se souvenir de la fin de la soirée... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «No dejo de pensar en la Magnae Accessio... En general fue un espectáculo bastante digno. Aunque el maestro de ceremonias se quejaba de que no recordaba el final de la noche...».
languages.original_text: "My thoughts keep turning to the Magnae Accessio... It was a rather dignified affair, all in all. Except the master of ceremonies complained that he could not remember the end of the night..."

traits.locale_text: «No dejo de pensar en la Magnae Accessio... En general fue un espectáculo bastante digno. Aunque el maestro de ceremonias se quejaba de que no recordaba el final de la noche...».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「マグナ・アクセッシオのことばかり考えています…全体としては、しかと威厳を示したと言えます。式典のマスターがその夜の終わりを思い出せないと言っていた点を除いてですが…」
languages.original_text: "My thoughts keep turning to the Magnae Accessio... It was a rather dignified affair, all in all. Except the master of ceremonies complained that he could not remember the end of the night..."

traits.locale_text: 「マグナ・アクセッシオのことばかり考えています…全体としては、しかと威厳を示したと言えます。式典のマスターがその夜の終わりを思い出せないと言っていた点を除いてですが…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Meine Gedanken kehren immer wieder zur Magnae Accessio zurück ... Es eine recht würdevolle Sache, alles in allem. Nur der Zeremonienmeister hat sich beschwert, dass er sich an das Ende des Abends nicht erinnern könne ..."
languages.original_text: "My thoughts keep turning to the Magnae Accessio... It was a rather dignified affair, all in all. Except the master of ceremonies complained that he could not remember the end of the night..."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Gedanken kehren immer wieder zur Magnae Accessio zurück ... Es eine recht würdevolle Sache, alles in allem. Nur der Zeremonienmeister hat sich beschwert, dass er sich an das Ende des Abends nicht erinnern könne ..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "My thoughts keep turning to the Magnae Accessio... It was a rather dignified affair, all in all. Except the master of ceremonies complained that he could not remember the end of the night..."

languages.text: "Düşüncelerim Magnae Accessio'dan uzaklaşamıyor. Neticede oldukça değerli bir hadiseydi. Tabii teşrifatçının, gecenin sonunu hatırlayamamasından sızlanması hariç."
languages.original_text: "My thoughts keep turning to the Magnae Accessio... It was a rather dignified affair, all in all. Except the master of ceremonies complained that he could not remember the end of the night..."

traits.locale_text: "Düşüncelerim Magnae Accessio'ya uğrayıp duruyor. Neticede oldukça değerli bir hadiseydi. Tabii teşrifatçının, gecenin sonunu hatırlayamamasından sızlanması hariç."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
